item.title: Service Mesh with Istio
item.description: A service mesh is a dedicated infrastructure layer for handling service-to-service communication. It’s responsible for the reliable delivery of requests through the complex topology of services that comprise a modern, cloud native application. Service mesh solutions have two distinct components that behave somewhat differently: The data planeis composed of a set of intelligent proxies (Envoy) deployed as sidecars. These proxies mediate and control all network communication between microservices along with Mixer, a general-purpose policy and telemetry hub.

item.title: Service Mesh using AWS App Mesh
item.description: Meshifying with AWS App Mesh (Part 1) Meshifying with AWS App Mesh (Part 2) At re:invent 2018, we announced AWS App Mesh, a service mesh that provides application-level networking to make it easy for your services to communicate with each other across multiple types of compute infrastructure. AWS App Mesh standardizes how your services communicate, giving you end-to-end visibility and ensuring high-availability for your applications. Service meshes like AWS App Mesh help you to run and monitor HTTP and TCP services at scale.
